languages.text: "Нет. Я не смогу служить {mf|тому|той}, кто не следует закону Бога-Императора. Кем бы я был, если бы ставил свою жизнь превыше веры и долга?"
"No. I cannot serve someone who does not follow the God-Emperor's Law. What kind of man would put his life above faith and duty?"
languages.original_text: "Нет. Я не смогу служить {mf|тому|той}, кто не следует закону Бога-Императора. Кем бы я был, если бы ставил свою жизнь превыше веры и долга?"

traits.locale_text: "No. I cannot serve someone who does not follow the God-Emperor's law. What kind of man would put his life above faith and duty?"
"No. I cannot serve someone who does not follow the God-Emperor's law. What kind of man would put his life above faith and duty?"
"No. I cannot serve someone who does not follow the God-Emperor's law. What kind of man would put his life above faith and duty?"
"No. I cannot serve someone who does not follow the God-Emperor's law. What kind of man would put his life above faith and duty?"
"No. I cannot serve someone who does not follow the God-Emperor's Law. What kind of man would put his life above faith and duty?"
"No. I cannot serve someone who does not follow the God-Emperor's Law. What kind of man would put his life above faith and duty?"

languages.text: "Nein, ich kann niemandem dienen, der das Gesetz des Gottimperators nicht befolgt. Welcher Mann würde sein Leben über Glaube und Pflicht stellen?"
languages.original_text: "No. I cannot serve someone who does not follow the God-Emperor's Law. What kind of man would put his life above faith and duty?"

traits.locale_text: "Nein, ich kann niemandem dienen, der das Gesetz des Gottimperators nicht befolgt. Welcher Mann würde sein Leben über Glaube und Pflicht stellen?"

languages.text: « Non. Je refuse de servir quelqu'un qui ne respecte pas la loi de l'Empereur-Dieu. Quel genre d'homme ferait passer sa vie avant la foi et le devoir ? »
languages.original_text: "No. I cannot serve someone who does not follow the God-Emperor's Law. What kind of man would put his life above faith and duty?"

traits.locale_text: « Non. Je refuse de servir quelqu'un qui ne respecte pas la loi de l'Empereur-Dieu. Quel genre d'homme ferait passer sa vie avant la foi et le devoir ? »
« Non. Je refuse de servir quelqu'un qui ne respecte pas la loi de l'Empereur-Dieu. Quel genre d'homme ferait passer sa vie avant la foi et le devoir ? »

languages.text: “不行，我无法侍奉不肯遵守神皇律法的人。究竟是什么样的人，才会为了生命而放弃信仰与职责？”
languages.original_text: "No. I cannot serve someone who does not follow the God-Emperor's Law. What kind of man would put his life above faith and duty?"

traits.locale_text: “不行，我无法侍奉不肯遵守神皇律法的人。究竟是什么样的人，才会为了生命而放弃信仰与职责？”

languages.text: «No. No puedo servir a alguien que no cumple la ley del Dios Emperador. ¿Qué clase de hombre pondría su vida por encima de la fe y el deber?».
languages.original_text: "No. I cannot serve someone who does not follow the God-Emperor's Law. What kind of man would put his life above faith and duty?"

traits.locale_text: «No. No puedo servir a alguien que no cumple la ley del Dios Emperador. ¿Qué clase de hombre pondría su vida por encima de la fe y el deber?».

languages.text: 「神帝陛下の法に従わない者に仕えることはできません。信仰や義務よりも自分の命を優先するような人間がいるでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "No. I cannot serve someone who does not follow the God-Emperor's Law. What kind of man would put his life above faith and duty?"

traits.locale_text: 「神帝陛下の法に従わない者に仕えることはできません。信仰や義務よりも自分の命を優先するような人間がいるでしょうか？」

languages.text: "Hayır. Tanrı İmparator'un Yasası'na uymayan birine hizmet edemem. Canını, imanından ve vazifesinden üstün tutan adamdan ne hayır gelir?"
languages.original_text: "No. I cannot serve someone who does not follow the God-Emperor's Law. What kind of man would put his life above faith and duty?"

traits.locale_text: "Hayır. Tanrı İmparator'un Yasası'na uymayan birine hizmet edemem. Canını, imanından ve vazifesinden üstün tutan adamdan ne hayır gelir?"
"Hayır. Tanrı İmparator'un kanununa uymayan birine hizmet edemem. Canını, imanından ve vazifesinden üstün tutan adamdan ne hayır gelir?"
